Reviews.Title: “Worst than expected”
Reviews.Author: dagima
Reviews.Content: reading tripadvisor advices expected bad beeing confirm positive aspects central location low prices building narrow hotel decadent furniture decrepit torn curtains broken hydraulic rusty breakfast wouldnt recommend hotel unless short stay

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for the price, great location, fully functional budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: Anna_Livia_Cannes
Reviews.Content: spend 4 nights pleasantly surprised location discover london short walk tube station bus stops quiet night close lively shopping street plenty affordable eat double own en suite facilities kettle tea coffee nice touch true building looks bit neglected furniture little ample sized clean functional excellent value money indeed dont plan stay lots time hotel perfectly adequate price hard beat

Reviews.Title: “Good location - very poor building condition, service and cleanliness”
Reviews.Author: W0rldTravel100
Reviews.Content: pubic hair toilet bathroom hair bed covers dilapidated noisy hotel website pictures location value money £69 double true shockingly manager duty overnight lunch time day leaving running hotel safety inhabitants hands polite overburdened receptionist dont website fool youd hostel wish id checked tripadvisor booking

HotelInfo.Name: Chelsea Lodge Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 268 Fulham Road | Chelsea, London SW109EW, England
